dev-1.x.name: drupal/popular_tags

security-coverage.message: Dev releases are not covered by Drupal security advisories.

dev-1.x.description: Allows the users to select taxonomy terms/tags by just clicking on them rather than typing them (auto-complete) or selecting them from a select box/checkbox/radio etc. It shows them a list of tag links, sorted by popularity (defined as how many nodes are tagged with it), up to a configurable maximum number.

1.0.0-alpha1.name: drupal/popular_tags

security-coverage.message: Alpha releases are not covered by Drupal security advisories.

1.0.0-alpha1.description: Allows the users to select taxonomy terms/tags by just clicking on them rather than typing them (auto-complete) or selecting them from a select box/checkbox/radio etc. It shows them a list of tag links, sorted by popularity (defined as how many nodes are tagged with it), up to a configurable maximum number.
